query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auto_save_state (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  stateKey VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  stateData JSON,
  timestamp BIGINT NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_user_key (userId, stateKey)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 46yA7HaDwBP5MYq.0cfa392d87a6 --database FgFuwHSp9rkJkcaPADwYhA --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auto_save_state (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  stateKey VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  stateData JSON,
  timestamp BIGINT NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_user_key (userId, stateKey)
);
